name: Fusioneer
description:
Welcome to the lab Amateur Fusioneers!!

Grab a lab coat and start firing atoms from the fusion cannon to get your fusion core as high as you can in this bubble shooting puzzle game! More fusions produce higher value atoms to experiment with and will allow you to output higher amounts of energy!

This fusion of puzzle and arcade gameplay is easy to pick up and play but rewards careful planning and precise shots. Get hooked in from your first fusion as you start your quest to create the largest fusion core possible!

Fusioneer features:
- One simple game mode with endless challenge
- A free and easy to learn bubble shooter, challenging to master!
- Special scientific power-ups to accelerate your experiments
- Cute animal scientists!
- Competitive leaderboards to track the leading scientific researchers
- Link your account via social media to play on any supported iOS device

Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/BoatRockerGames/
Follow us on Twitter! https://twitter.com/BoatRockerGames/
Follow us on Instagram! https://www.instagram.com/boatrockergames/
